alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 10:05AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow developing this morning with periods of moderate to heavy snow late this morning into this afternoon. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...McDonough and Hancock Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...PTravel could be difficult in heavy snow and ver low visibility. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong north winds and temperatures in the 20s will cause considerable blowing and drifting..
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
